name: yiddish24
0:
”Alexa, open yiddish twenty four”
”Alexa, start yiddish twenty four”
”Alexa, launch yiddish twenty four”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yiddish twenty four
des:
With this action, you will be able to listen to Jewish music streams non-stop coming from the all known Kol Mevaser and yiddish24.com website just by saying

1) Alexa, open yiddish twenty four
2) Alexa, start yiddish twenty four
3) Alexa, launch yiddish twenty four

listen and enjoy
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
